org.mt4j.util.opengl
Class GLFboStack

java.lang.Object
  org.mt4j.util.opengl.GLFboStack

public class GLFboStack
extends java.lang.Object

The FBO stack manages the current opengl drawing target. It allows to switch drawing to/from different frame buffer objects. Usage:

GLFboStack.getInstance(gl).pushFBO(); //saves the current render target/frame buffer
GLFboStack.getInstance(gl).useFBO(glFBO); //changes to another frame buffer
GLFboStack.getInstance(gl).popFBO() //switches back to the previously saved frame buffer

Author:
Christopher Ruff

popFBO

public void popFBO()
Pops the fbo. This switches back (binds) to the formely pushed fbo.
NOTE: THIS UNBINDS A CURRENT FBO IF SET! -> no need for calling unbind()!
